identified-content.org: DU PONT DE NEMOURS, E I, & CO

block.p: LEAD: E. I. du Pont de Nemours & Company said it had developed proprietary technology for compounds that in some cases can replace fully halogenated chlorofluorocarbons, which are used to service refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment. Du Pont said the three-component blends have an ozone-depletion potential about 97 percent less than that of chlorofluorocarbon-12, one of the products suspected of depleting the earth's ozone layer.

LEAD: E. I. du Pont de Nemours & Company said it had developed proprietary technology for compounds that in some cases can replace fully halogenated chlorofluorocarbons, which are used to service refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment. Du Pont said the three-component blends have an ozone-depletion potential about 97 percent less than that of chlorofluorocarbon-12, one of the products suspected of depleting the earth's ozone layer.

E. I. du Pont de Nemours & Company said it had developed proprietary technology for compounds that in some cases can replace fully halogenated chlorofluorocarbons, which are used to service refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment. Du Pont said the three-component blends have an ozone-depletion potential about 97 percent less than that of chlorofluorocarbon-12, one of the products suspected of depleting the earth's ozone layer.
Du Pont said it had been granted a patent on the blends.
